name: Fit in!
description:
It's look easy, right? Think again! Move the cubes into the center area in correct order and make a full square without hitting each other. It’s harder than it looks! You can be sure of that, we promise!

Features
- Simple yet challenging and innovative gameplay.
- Beautiful and elegant design.
- So many new characters to collect. Unlock them all!
- Different kind of animations for each character.
- Race against other players via Leaderboard.
- Get your hourly rewards.
- Free to Play.
